tagline: Seeking New opportunities in Sales | Business Development | Sales Manager | Account Manager
body:
BEN AL-MISNED
Telephone: 0777 377 1415 ~ Email: ben.almisned@gmail.com


CLIENT-CENTRIC, RESULTS-ORIENTED AND TENACIOUS SALES SPECIALIST
OFFERS 18+ YEARS’ SUCCESS DRIVING PROFITABILITY AND PERFORMANCE IN COMPETITIVE MARKETPLACES


Pragmatic and consistently top-performing sales professional with proven success producing and disseminating sales / account strategies and plans; identifying and exploiting market potential to exceed targets and facilitate growth in both market share and profitability while utilising a motivational leadership style in the development of customer-oriented teams. Qualifying and closing strategic and profitable propositions while pioneering processes for aggressive growth plans in competitive environments and difficult economic climates. Enjoys maintaining familiarisation with the commercial challenges faced by senior leaders through an interest in NLP (Neuro-Linguistic Programming) and behavioural psychology. Strong team player with excellent interpersonal communication skills; energetic, dynamic, relishes challenges and is quick and willing to assimilate and apply new processes and procedures. Competencies include:

 
•	Consultative Sales	
•	Business Development
•	Needs Analysis
•	Lead and Referral Generation
•	Negotiation and Influencing
•	Team Collaboration
•	Analytical / Strategic Thinking
•	Interpersonal Communication
•	Customer Retention / Loyalty
•	Complex Problem Solving
•	Sales Cycle Management
•	Revenue Growth
•	Administrative Controls
•	Staff Leadership and Motivation
•	Active Listening
 


PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE AND ACHIEVEMENTS
	
Business Development Manager
ULTRA COUTURE DESIGN LIMITED, LONDON							2012 - Present

Marketed and sold bespoke furniture solutions and equipment catering to property developers, interior designers and high net-worth client projects.

•	Generated £140k profit having negotiated a contract to supply high-end furniture and complete fit out to a major industrial office building.
•	Secured on-going contracts with 40 high-end interior design companies.
•	Led projects from inception to completion, including purchasing, outsourcing, and client relations.
•	Boosted sales revenue of existing dealer channel by 32% in only 12 months.
•	Grew region's dealer channel from 19 to 31 dealers.
•	Effectively followed up and maintained regular contact with all new and existing customers to ensure relationships were maintained for potential repeat business and referrals.
•	Utilised various sources to prospect for new opportunities.


Key achievements
•	Sold the maximum number of new and used vehicles through the creation of effective sales processes.
•	Achieved sales of £1.3M despite a competitive market place and difficult economic climate.
•	Forged, maintained and nurtured strong client relationships conducive to business growth.
•	Utilised a consultative sales approach to effectively analyse and delineate customer requirements and promote appropriate solutions.
•	Delivered 624 cars in the first 12-month season – exceeding previous year's record, despite rising fuel prices.
•	Boosted sales departments FNI conversion to 72%, MBI to 58% and Guard-X product to 27%.
•	Recommended and implemented new pricing strategies; influenced and negotiated with senior management.
•	Consistently recognised as one of dealership's top-ranked salesmen each month (awarded five times Guard-X champion based on sales performance and selling 52-71 vehicles per month).



PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE AND ACHIEVEMENTS CONTINUED…

Senior Sales Consultant 
CAR GIANT LIMITED, LONDON									2009 – 2012

•	Cultivated and maintained key client relationships to successfully sell vehicles valued from £15K to £80K.
•	Developed sales strategies and set challenging personal sales goals to ensure peak performance.
•	Maximised sales by influencing well-established clients and building relationships with prospective customers.
•	Promoted new products and maintained awareness of sales events.
•	Ensured optimal experience for each client; from initial meeting through final delivery.
•	Consistently monitored inventory levels and in-stock products.
•	Maintained awareness of cutting-edge and emerging industry trends, conducive to business development.
•	Trained and directed the activities of 15 Sales Executives.

Senior Sales Executive / Junior Business Manager
BMW, LONDON							                                                      2006 – 2009

•	Sales and Negotiation with clients in a prestige market.
•	Build and develop client rapport and relationships using Customer Relationship Management.
•	Fully FSA accredited for motor trade. 
•	Deputise in absence of Business Manager.
•	Manage sales targets and penetration rates on a monthly basis.
•	Achieving sales and finance penetration targets on a monthly basis since joining the brand and rolling 98% on Customer Satisfaction Index.
•	Coach team members on different parts of the sales process. Consistently top performer of the sales team.

EARLY CAREER SUMMARY

•	Maximised profitability at Sportscraft Limited, London (2002 – 06) through the sale of used prestige cars; championed the consistent delivery of first class customer service, alongside energy, drive and enthusiasm.
•	Named ‘Top Achiever’ as Telesales Executive at OneTel, London (2000 – 02) within just three months in recognition of hard work, strategic vision and reputation for service excellence and customer relationship building.
•	Facilitated new business development at Warranty Holdings International (1997 – 00); coached and mentored sales staff while building a pipeline of opportunities and identifying and following up new targets - utilised initiative, creativity and motivation to surpass challenging performance goals and sales targets.


ACADEMIC ACHIEVEMENTS

BA Business Information Systems and Technology
MIDDLESEX UNIVERSITY, LONDON								1994 – 1997

A-Level Business Studies, Economics and History						
DAVID GAME COLLEGE, LONDON								1992 – 1994

10 GCSEs, including English, Maths and Science
DAVID GAME COLLEGE, LONDON								1990 – 1992

REFERENCES AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST
